snippet: NASA postponed the first test flight of its Orion spacecraft on Thursday morning because of a problem with the launch rocket’s fuel system.
abstract: NASA postpones first test flight of its Orion spacecraft due to problem with launch rocket’s fuel system.
lead_paragraph: NASA postponed the first test flight of its Orion spacecraft on Thursday morning because of a problem with the launch rocket’s fuel system.

headline.main: Florida: Orion Test Postponed for Fuel System Problem
headline.print_headline: Florida: Orion Test Postponed for Fuel System Problem
